original_title: TV Derana picks up top awards at Raigam Tele’es 2023
original_body_lines: Derana media network picked up multiple top awards at the Raigam Tele’es 2023 – The Nation’s Tele Awards taking place at the Shangri-La Hotel in Colombo on Saturday (30).
“Kids Academy” program on Ada Derana 24 produced by K. C. Saranga won the Best Education Programme award.
Meanwhile, ‘Surakimu Budhu Sasuna’ a documentary programme on Ada Derana 24, produced by Wasanthi Nanayakkara, picked up the Special Jury Award.
